channel.title: CVE Feed for Citadel -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-44272|2023-10-04T08:07:46.459Z -- citadel -- citadel
item.description: A cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in Citadel versions prior to 994. When a malicious user sends an instant message with some JavaScript code, the script may be executed on the web browser of the victim user.
